```{r}
library(dplyr)
diff_KO_data <- data.table::fread("D:/HSC_Autophagy/3.TFKO_data/KnockTF/differential expression of genes in all datasets.txt",sep="\t",header=T)
TF_list <- unique(dorothea_regulons$hs_regulons$tf)
TF_diff_tab <- diff_KO_data %>% filter(TF == Gene & P_value<0.1 & Log2FC<0 & up_down==2 & TF %in% TF_list)

length(table(TF_diff_tab$TF))
```
